lines: JESUS, THOU JOY OF LOVING HEARTS
U Xihlovo Xa Vutomi Ka Vanhu, Hi Tshika Rifumu Ra Swa Misava, Hi Vuyela Ka Wena Yesu.
Wa Ponisa Lava Ku Vitanaka, Ka Lava Lavaka Wena Lonene, Hi We U Nkhinsameriwaka.
Ndzi Navela Ku Xurha Wena Yesu, Hi Nwa Ka Wena Mati Lamanene, Wa Hi Korwisa Emimoyeni.
4. Hi Ni Torha Emoyeni, Hinkwako Laha Hi Welaka Kona,
Hi Tsakela Ku Vona Nghohe Yaku, I Nkateko Ku Ku Pfumela.
U Hi Nyika Ku Rhula Emoyeni, Susa Wona Munyama Wa Vudyoho, Voninga Misava Hinkwayo.
